notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.D., A.H., S.H., C.B. co-wrote the paper, with input from all authors. S.D. conceived the experimental design, conducted the biogeochemical/ecosystem/optical model simulations, and performed most of the analysis. O.J. was responsible for the numerical code and provided context for the optical diagnostics. E.M. conducted the Earth System Model simulations that provided the ocean physical fields to drive the ecosystem model. C.B. provided expertise on, and code for, the statistical calculations.
